attributes.action: Have school start and finish later in the day e.g. start at 10:00 finish 16:20
attributes.additional_details: An idea would be to have it start one to two hours later. Start at 09:50 or 10:50 and finish at 16:20 or 17:20
attributes.background: Have school start later on in the day so children can get a healthy amout of sleep, and be fully awake to help their education. This may also prevent many adults, suffering stress and loss of sleep from school run and work.
